title: Challenger Series Questions
body:
Good morning,

I am currently a coach for a team that has aspirations of reaching the Challenger Series and eventually the LCS in the future. I am trying to get my team to reach the CS by Spring of 2017 and was wondering how exactly we could get into the CS Qualifiers with the new re-introduction of ranked 5s. I know it used to be like the top Challenger teams and such but i was wondering is that still the case? If you could get back to me at your earliest convenience and help shed some light on this or just point me in the right direction of where to look it would be very appreciated. Thank you

UseTheForceLuke

replies.body: Mye nailed it!  We'll still be relying on the Open Qualifier system via Battlegrounds.  We do not intend on using Ranked Teams in any capacity for Challenger Series qualifiers.

> [{quoted}](name=Tiza,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=RWUV9EqM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-30T01:17:08.132+0000)
>
> Mye nailed it!  We'll still be relying on the Open Qualifier system via Battlegrounds.  We do not intend on using Ranked Teams in any capacity for Challenger Series qualifiers.

The better question is: will we see challenger series icons much the same we have the LCS ones? The new misfits bunny looks absolutely adorable, just have to have it alongside my TDK/Dignitas ones.
Nope, that's not in the cards.  Someday, maybe, but that depends on how Challenger evolves as a league over the next few years.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/blhUQ1JO-challenger-series-open-qualifier-sign-ups

This should explain much of how it works.
